attributes.action: To allow current year 12 A level students to drop 1 subject.
attributes.additional_details: To be able to allow all students to catch up on work a sensible rate and allow students to achieve the best grades they can in the limited time they have.
attributes.background: To allow all current A level students to drop a subject and be able to get into any university to allow students time to catch up with work.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Universities are responsible for deciding the entry grades required for admissions.
